text: 2|158|tirccayayum saphayum marvayum matacihnannalayi allahu niscayiccatil pettatakunnu. ka'aba mandirattil cenn hajjea umrahyea nirvahikkunna etearalum avayilute pradaksinam natattunnatil kurrameannumilla. arenkilum salkarm'mam svayam sannad'dhanayi ceyyukayanenkil tirccayayum allahu krtajnanum sarvvajnanumakunnu
